question: rocket size electron vs falcon 9

ground_truth_answer: The Electron rocket is 57 feet (17 meters) tall, while the Falcon 9 v1.0 was significantly larger at 47.8 meters (157 feet) tall. The Falcon 9 could also carry much more payload, with a capacity of 10,450 kg to low Earth orbit compared to Electron's 227 kg capacity.
